  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractInputParamConverterProvider<T>
    Abstract base class for input-aware ("in" and "name") ParamConverter.
    AbstractUnwrappingExceptionMapper<T extends javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException>
    Abstract base class for unwrapping BadRequestProblem cause from WebApplicationExceptions.
    BadRequestExceptionMapper
    Exception mapper for BadRequestException, with special handling for unwrapping BadRequestProblem cause thrown by ParamConverter.
    ConstraintViolationExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for mapping ConstraintViolationException to BadRequestProblem.
    DefaultExceptionMapper
    Default ExceptionMapper for mapping unhandled exceptions to InternalServerErrorProblem.
    EJBExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for unhandled EJBExceptions.
    JacksonJsonMappingExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for mapping jackson JsonMappingException to BadRequestProblem.
    JacksonJsonParseExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for mapping jackson JsonParseException to BadRequestProblem.
    JacksonMismatchedInputExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for mapping jackson MismatchedInputException to BadRequestProblem.
    JaxRsParameterNameProvider
    A ParameterNameProvider that retrieves the parameter name from JAX-RS annotations (if present).
    NotFoundExceptionMapper
    Exception mapper for NotFoundException, with special handling for unwrapping BadRequestProblem cause thrown by ParamConverter.
    ProblemConfigurator
    ServletContextListener that configures the problem module properties based on the following locations in order: System property Environment variable web.xml context param
    ProblemExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for Problem.
    ProblemMediaType
    The "application/problem+json" MediaType.
    ProblemObjectMapper
    ObjectMapper that registers the CdiProblemModule.

    WebApplicationExceptionMapper
    ExceptionMapper for unhandled WebApplicationExceptions.
